mapper.select: select count(s.ID) num, substr(s.VEHICLENO,1,1) carNum from jq_tvpm_vehiclelog_part s where s.VCODE = #{vcode} and substr(s.ACCESSDATE,1,10) = #{day} group by substr(s.ACCESSDATE,1,10),CARNUM,s.VCODE ORDER BY num desc

select count(s.ID) num, PROVINCE as carNum from jq_tvpm_vehiclelog_part s where s.VCODE = #{vcode} AND city IS NOT NULL AND province IS NOT NULL and s.ACCESSDATE BETWEEN #{beginDay} AND #{endDay} group by CARNUM ORDER BY num desc

select count(s.ID) num, PROVINCE as carNum from jq_tvpm_vehiclelog_part s where s.VCODE = #{vcode} AND city IS NOT NULL AND province IS NOT NULL and s.ACCESSDATE between #{beginTime} and #{endTime} group by CARNUM ORDER BY num desc

select count(s.ID) num, substr(s.VEHICLENO,1,1) carNum from jq_tvpm_vehiclelog_part s where s.VCODE = #{vcode} and DATE_FORMAT(s.ACCESSDATE,'%Y') = #{year} group by substr(s.ACCESSDATE,1,4),CARNUM,VCODE ORDER BY num desc

select count(s.ID) num, PROVINCE as carNum from jq_tvpm_vehiclelog_part s where s.VCODE = #{vcode} AND city IS NOT NULL AND province IS NOT NULL and (s.ACCESSDATE BETWEEN #{beginYear} AND #{endYear}) group by CARNUM ORDER BY num desc

select count(s.ID) num, PROVINCE as carNum from jq_tvpm_vehiclelog_part s where s.VCODE = #{vcode} AND city IS NOT NULL AND province IS NOT NULL and s.ACCESSDATE BETWEEN #{startTime} and #{endTime} group by CARNUM ORDER BY num desc
